name: MPM_ATTRIB_DEPT
description: This table contains data about departments attributed to patients for My Panel Metrics.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique IDs of the departments attributed to the patient for the purpose of My Panel Metrics

columns.name: MEASURE_GROUP_C_NAME
columns.description: Measure groups attributed to departments for this patient for the purpose of My Panel Metrics.

columns.name: ATTRIB_RULE_LIST
columns.description: A comma-delimited list of attribution rules that attributed the department to the measure group.

columns.name: ATTRIB_PROV_LIST
columns.description: A comma-delimited list of providers that attributed the department to the measure group.

columns.name: ATTRIB_LOC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the revenue location for the attributed department.

columns.name: ATTRIB_SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the service area for the attributed department.
